resources.string:
Hi, my name is Ryan and I am going into my 4th year of engineering at UBC in the integrated engineering program and I am looking for co-op placement for 4-8 months. Through side projects and extracurriculars, I have learned to be resourceful in the projects I take on such as working on a portable smart ECG, a telemetry board for UBC Solar and a helmet assembly for assisted respiration. Each of these projects I knew very little about beforehand, however my resourcefulness and determination allowed me to succeed. I would like to work in the biomedical industry because I have some experience with low voltage system design, programming and I am passionate about helping people. 

 Attached are a quick glimpse of my contributions to these projects. 

 I hope I can help your company succeed in it's endeavours. 

 Kind regards, 

 Ryan Lee
